title: Level up Mission, no reward
body: Theres a mission saying I get a champ capsule for leveling up, but it says completed even though I just logged on. Not sure if I get a reward or something for the mission or if its a bug?

replies.body:
You've got a good deal of missions completed already so it's kinda hard to know which you're referring to. I'm assuming you meant the Level 30 Level Up reward which was the Large Capsule you opened. That one had Camille Olaf and Fiddlesticks in it!

If you were talking about a different mission feel free to correct me ^_^
